shorts.title: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.2M in health care costs
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.
shorts.description: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content_distilled: Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.

shorts.title: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to Board of Directors
shorts.title_distilled: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.

shorts.title: Troopers claim retaliation in lawsuit over alleged payroll fraud
shorts.title_distilled: Troopers claim retaliation in lawsuit over alleged payroll fraud.
shorts.description: Two Pennsylvania state troopers have filed a lawsuit against Gov. Josh Shapiro and others, claiming they faced retaliation after reporting payroll fraud within the department.

shorts.title: HS BASKETBALL: Scranton Prep ascends to top spot in boys poll
shorts.title_distilled: HS BASKETBALL: Scranton Prep ascends to top spot in boys poll.
shorts.description: For the second time this basketball season, there is a new team at the top of the boys’ rankings. Scranton Prep, winners of seven straight games, handed Valley View its first loss and climbed two spots to No. 1 in the poll. The Cavaliers were also aided by Dunmore’s upset of previously top-ranked Riverside last week. There was no change at No. 1 in the girls’ poll. Valley View secured wins over Scranton Prep and Wallenpaupack to maintain its ranking at the top with an 11-1 record. In the boys’ poll, Scranton Prep faces an immediate challenge when it plays […]
shorts.content: For the second time this basketball season, there is a new team at the top of the boys’ rankings. Scranton Prep, winners of seven straight games, handed Valley View its first loss and climbed two spots to No. 1 in the poll. The Cavaliers were also aided by Dunmore’s upset of previously top-ranked Riverside last week. There was no change at No. 1 in the girls’ poll. Valley View secured wins over Scranton Prep and Wallenpaupack to maintain its ranking at the top with an 11-1 record. In the boys’ poll, Scranton Prep faces an immediate challenge when it plays […]

shorts.title: Scranton community protests against ICE shooting
shorts.title_distilled: Scranton community protests against ICE shooting.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Local people were among tens of thousands nationwide protesting the United States Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE). The protests follow the deadly shooting days ago involving an ICE agent and a Minneapolis protester. Protesters in Scranton say things need to change during such volatile times. Chants against ICE echoed on [...]

shorts.title: VIDEO: Snow squalls sweep through NEPA
shorts.title_distilled: VIDEO: Snow squalls sweep through NEPA.
shorts.description: WEST PITTSTON, LUZERNE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Snow squalls moved through parts of northeastern Pennsylvania. One blew through West Pittston Sunday afternoon at around 2:30 p.m. It appeared not to stick to the pavement on Carpenter Street, but it was dropping a dusting on lawns. If you take any pictures or videos of the recent snowfall, [...]
shorts.content: WEST PITTSTON, LUZERNE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Snow squalls moved through parts of northeastern Pennsylvania. One blew through West Pittston Sunday afternoon at around 2:30 p.m. It appeared not to stick to the pavement on Carpenter Street, but it was dropping a dusting on lawns. If you take any pictures or videos of the recent snowfall, [...]
